title: Salute to Vienna Concert
content:
Celebrate the musical heritage of Vienna with  Salute to Vienna 
 
8pm, Saturday, January 2, 2016 
Barbara B Mann Performing Arts Hall 
 
$ 200 per pair or $186 per pair 
Secure your seats and support WGCU today. 
 
The concert presents the most-popular excerpts from well-known operettas like “The Merry Widow”, “Land of Smiles” , “Die Fledermaus,” and many others, performed by an international cast of superstars. Fall in love with the music of “Waltz King”, Johann Strauss Jr., as ballet dancers glide across the stage to the sounds of the “Blue Danube” performed by the Vienna Boys Choir and the Symphony Orchestra of the Volksoper, Vienna.  This wonderful production from the glittering Wiener Konzerthaus is filled with enchanting moments.   The concert also features the beautiful compositions of Franz Lehár, Imre Kálmán, Robert Stolz, Carl Zeller, Sigmund Romberg and Giuseppe Verdi.
